tal:block.p: Creative Commons, Warner Bros. Records, and Machine Shop Recordings are proud to present the Fort Minor Remix Contest. Fort Minor is offering the separated audio elements of "Remember the Name" online under a Creative Commons BY-NC license, so that producers all over the world can easily create remixes of the hit song.

To enter, produce a remix of Fort Minor's "Remember the Name" (download the audio sources here) and upload it to ccMixter before May 6, 2006. All entries must be licensed to the public under a CC BY-NC license. After all eligible entries have been received, Fort Minor's Mike Shinoda will choose a winning remix. The producer of the winning remix will be awarded a new Technics SL-1200MK5 turntable, courtesy of Warner Bros. Records and Machine Shop Recordings.

Your remix must include the vocal track from "Remember the Name." You may, but are not required to, also include other elements from the original version of the song in your remix. You can download the album version of "Remember the Name" for free by visiting Fort Minor's MySpace page.

Note: You are free to use music licensed under CC BY or CC BY-NC, audio in the public domain, and your own original sounds in your remix. Submissions that include music that you don't have permission to use will become ineligible.

div.div: Fort Minor is a hip-hop project fronted by Linkin Park vocalist/ guitarist/keyboardist Mike Shinoda. Fort Minor's debut album, The Rising Tied was executive produced by Jay-Z and features Styles of Beyond, Common, John Legend, Black Thought of The Roots, and Holly Brook. To hear Fort Minor's music, visit the group's MySpace page. For information about Warner Bros. Records artists and releases, visit the label's Web site.

ol.li: Read the following sections and the Official Rules. (Also available for download as a PDF file.) This is important, because you're agreeing to the rules by participating in the contest.

Use this form to submit your remix before May 6, 2006.
Log in to ccMixter and submit your remix under a CC BY-NC license by May 6, 2006. If you don't already have a ccMixter account, create one here.

tal:block.p: Download the separated audio elements of Fort Minor's "Remember the Name" here.

Entries must be in MP3 format. Duration of an entry may not exceed 5 minutes. All eligible entries must be received via ccMixter.org by 9:00 p.m. PST on May 6, 2006. Entries that finish uploading after 9:00 p.m. PST on May 6, 2006 will not be eligible. Listen to the current entries.

After all eligible entries have been received, Fort Minor's Mike Shinoda will choose a winning remix. The producer of the winning remix will receive a Technics SL-1200MK5 turntable, courtesy of Warner Bros. Records and Machine Shop Recordings.
